code: import axios from"axios";import{LIMIT}from"../../../../../constant";import{URL}from"../../../../../apis";export var getTags=function getTags(){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/tags"));};export var getArticleByTag=function getArticleByTag(tag,token,offset){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles?limit=").concat(LIMIT,"&offset=").concat(offset),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},params:{tag:tag}});};export var getArticleByTagNoToken=function getArticleByTagNoToken(tag,offset){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles?limit=").concat(LIMIT,"&offset=").concat(offset),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},params:{tag:tag}});};
